data.message: Eminem is by far the fittest bloke on this planet , his music tells it as it , keeping it real !! Nuff respect to this man

replies.message: What is your version of keeping it real? I'd love 2 know
His music tells as it is..... ESP the older stuff , he tells his life story throu his music, all the obstacles his over came......
U saying my comment is retaarted???

Do you have a #Monster within you? Im sure everybody does somewhere deep in themselves right. I would like to present to you 

" JaySaint Da Synnr - Im a Monster now x Sir Flo x Sammi Auto "

Just a lil Single i cooked up with some homies from my Home town. Enjoy the track and Share away. Dont forget to VOTE today for my submission in the FV contest this year and get Ready for my new Album that will be dropping soon. #ChronicLogic
